headline.main: Is the United States a 'Racial Democracy'?

docs.abstract: The disparities in our criminal justice system threaten our core political values.
docs.snippet: The disparities in our criminal justice system threaten our core political values.

byline.original: By JASON STANLEY and VESLA WEAVER

docs.lead_paragraph: In a move that some fear could compromise care for Medicare recipients, the Obama administration is proposing to remove special protections that guarantee seniors access to a wide selection of three types of drugs.

headline.main: Proposed Medicare Drug Change Stirs Access Worries
headline.print_headline: Proposed Medicare Drug Change Stirs Access Worries

docs.snippet: In a move that some fear could compromise care for Medicare recipients, the Obama administration is proposing to remove special protections that guarantee seniors access to a wide selection of three types of drugs.

docs.lead_paragraph: Many Americans who signed up through the federal marketplace for health care coverage have yet to receive an insurance card, policy number or bill.

headline.main: Enrollees at Health Exchanges Face Struggle to Prove Coverage
headline.print_headline: Enrollees at Health Exchanges Face Struggle to Prove Coverage

docs.abstract: Patients across the country are having difficulties with insurance policies bought under the health care reform law, which went into effect on Jan 1; in addition to problems many face in proving they have coverage, patients are also having a hard time figuring out which doctors are affiliated with their plans, and often doctors themselves do not know.
docs.snippet: Many Americans who signed up through the federal marketplace for health care coverage have yet to receive an insurance card, policy number or bill.

byline.contributor: Robert Pear reported from Fort Worth, and Abby Goodnough from Washington. Anemona Hartocollis and Reed Abelson contributed reporting from New York.
byline.original: By ROBERT PEAR and ABBY GOODNOUGH

docs.lead_paragraph: In a move that some fear could compromise care for Medicare recipients, the Obama administration is proposing to remove special protections that guarantee seniors access to a wide selection of three types of prescription drugs.

headline.main: Proposed Medicare Drug Change Stirs Access Worries
